How to install?

No good with my resolution(800*480)

Download/Install Instructions:

1. Install the supplied APK on your device
2. Unzip the content of the SDCard.zip to the root of your SD Card
3. Copy your content (maps, poi, 3D, elevations) to your SD Card's iGO\Content directory (not iGO My Way\Content)
4. Insert your SD Card into the device and launch the application from phone menu

In the file iGO\content\skin\iGO8_Ultra.zip\info.ini there is the information "supported_resolutions="240_320,320_240".
